body.name: KRIB BLING Full-Automatic Washing Machine 25 lbs Portable Washer 10 Wash Program & 8 Water Level with LED Display，Drain Pump, Come with a Glass Cover, Ideal for Apartments, RV, Camping, Grey
features: 👔【Easy to Operate】: This product has straight forward illustrations and descriptions. There is no installation need and easy to operate. It won't take you much time and could take convenience to you. If you have any quality problem,please feel free to contact us, our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours."

👕【Relief Your Hands】: Our portable full automatic laundry washing machine only needs a small space for store, which is a solution for compact living. Once you set the washing machine program, you could just leave it alone to work and do your own staffs. It could relief your hands and you could use the time to do other things.

👖【Large Wash and Spin Capacity】: This washing machine is compact and lightweight for you to easily move it in your home or department. But the honeycomb shaped inner tub can load 8 lbs at one time and wash many clothes for you. In manual, we also listed reference weight of various clothes.

👗【Water Level and Mode Control】: 10Programs for choosing: wash-rinse-spin, soak-wash-rinse -spin, wash, wash-risne, rinse-spin, spin. You could adjust the different washing mode through the wash push-button and control the water level via the switch. Different clothes have different washing and water level requirement. You can stop wasting hours keeping an eye on washing machine for its full automatic clean mode.

👚【Full Automatic Machine】: This machine features a built in drain aluminum pump and a drainage tube which allows you to easily drain out dirty water, which is good choice for apartment or dorm doing medium or little weight laundry.

Why does the washing machine leak when received? After the production of the factory, there will be a washing machine drainage test, which may be the water left in the pipe. It is not a quality problem and can be used normally. Can use this product by filling manually with a bucket? Our washing machine can be manually filled with water, and only after the water reaches a certain water level can the machine operate normally. How many water level options does this washer have? With 3 water level: L/16L M/23L H/30L. You could adjust the different washing mode through the wash push-button and control the water level via the switch. Will tihs washer work by putting water in manually, or does it have to be hooked up to a spigot? Dear Customer,thanks for your questions. Yes, this portable washer not only allows you to put water in manually, but also can be hooked up to a spigot. Hoping it will help you. Why did Washer add water, but it can't work? It may be 1. If the water is added manually, it may not reach the water level, so it cannot be started normally; 2. If immersion washing is selected, it needs to wait for a while to start normally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Brought it for my daughter she loves it right size and it washes amazing. The clothes come out almost dry and no noise. Very satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this washer!
reviews.reviewText: What a wonderful thing to have clean laundry without going to the laundromat! This hooked up easily to my bathroom sink and I kept the hose at the level and angle they specified and also put a lint trap on the end- would highly recommend the lint trap! Drained it into the toilet bowl with the lid closed ( bowl was clean, of course! ). I’ve done sheets for a queen bed, futon covers, towels, pants, etc. all come out amazing and clean! Tried a deep clean, regular and quick wash all with 1/2 oz of laundry detergent- just as you would for an HE washer. Doesn’t take much at all to get really clean!Do:put the laundry soap in as it fillsTry the quick wash- 22 minutes to clean clothes!Keep an eye on the hoses to make sure they are tight, but not over tightenedOnce you have that down, you are good to go!Don’t:Overfill- it holds plenty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One on the 3 greatest inventions of modern day.
reviews.reviewText: Loved how easy to operate. Quiet, convenient. Has a nice water sound like water washing up on the shore . No more lugging heavy stuff to the dirty public laundry mat. It's unbelievable how much easier it makes my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small tight space
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has recently downsized to a smaller living space, the KRIB BLING Full-Automatic Washing Machine has been a lifesaver for me. I was hesitant to switch to a compact machine, but this one has exceeded my expectations.I love the convenience of having 10 different wash programs to choose from, each tailored to different fabrics and levels of dirtiness. As someone who is always on the go, being able to throw my clothes in and press a button is a huge time saver.The LED display is easy to read and adds a sleek touch to the machine. I appreciate being able to see the selected wash program and water level at a glance, even if I'm in a dimly lit room.The 8 water level options are also a great feature, especially for someone like me who wants to conserve water and energy. I love being able to choose the perfect water level for my load, without wasting resources.The machine's compact size has been perfect for my needs. I can easily move it from room to room or take it with me on the go. It's also surprisingly quiet, which is a huge plus for me as I often work from home.One thing to keep in mind is that the machine is best suited for smaller loads. I typically do laundry for one or two people, so the 17.7 lb capacity is more than enough. However, if you have a larger family or frequently wash bulky items, you may want to consider a larger machine.Overall, I highly recommend the KRIB BLING Full-Automatic Washing Machine for anyone who needs a compact, portable machine that doesn't sacrifice power or convenience. It has made my life so much easier and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Al virarla para instalar la rejilla boto agua. Espero no se dañe .Por lo pronto la probé y lavo y exprimió bien.Hoy es el segundo día de uso.ACTUALIZACIÓNLLEVO UN MES Y DIS SEMANAS CON ELLA Y MENHA DADO PROBLEMAS YA QUE NO QUERÍA NOTAR EL AGUA .
